doc:
Paul Benedict https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Benedict 0 Paul Benedict (September 17, 1938 – December 1, 2008) was an American actor who made numerous appearances in television and movies beginning in 1965. He was known for his roles as The Number Painter on the PBS children's show Sesame Street and as the English neighbor Harry Bentley on the CBS sitcom The Jeffersons. Paul_Benedict ( September_17_,_1938 – December_1_,_2008 ) was an_American_actor who made numerous_appearances in television_and_movies beginning in 1965 . He was_known for his_roles as The_Number Painter on the_PBS_children 's_show_Sesame_Street and as the_English_neighbor_Harry_Bentley on the_CBS_sitcom The_Jeffersons .
